import React, {useCallback, useState} from 'react'; import { Div, Img, A, Form, Input, Button } from './signup'; const SignUp = () => { const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState({ email: '', password: '', nickname: '' }); const { email, password, nickname } = userInfo; const onUserInfoChange = useCallback((e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUserInfo({ ...userInfo, name: value, }) }) return (
